Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache

Contains some caching features, based on RAM or/and the SD card (persistence) of the terminal.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Cacher.Instructions
    Indicates whether the current cached data should be taken from the cache.
    DbPersistence.DbCleanUpPolicy
    The basis interface for all DbPersistence instances.
    Persistence.CleanUpPolicy
    Defines a basis policy/strategy interface used when cleaning up the persistence instance.
    Values.CacheableValue<BusinessObjectType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,ProblemExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
    Defines a basic contract which enables to cache a business object in memory, know when it has been cached, and have a dynamic strategy for refreshing the object.
    Values.CachingEvent
    Used when requesting a Values.CacheableValue or a Values.CachedMap for retrieving a business object, depending on the current workflow.
    Values.Instructions<BusinessObjectType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,ProblemExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
    Used and required when the business object is not available in memory.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cacher<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
    A class which enables to cache business objects.
    DbPersistence
    Enables to store some input streams on a SQLite database.
    DbPersistence.CacheColumns
    Defined in order to set up the database columns.
    DbPersistence.LastUpdateDbCleanUpPolicy
    A simple clean up strategy, which removes the entries older that a certain of time, which is customizable through the DbPersistence.LastUpdateDbCleanUpPolicy.RETENTION_DURATION_IN_MILLISECONDS field.
    FilePersistence
    Enables to store on the internal/external device "hard-drive" and cache in memory some contents.
    MemoryCacher<BusinessObjectType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
    A class which enables to cache the result of web service calls in RAM only.
    NullPersistence
    An implementation of persistence which stores nothing.
    Persistence
    Enables to store persistently on the internal/external device "hard-drive" some contents.
    Persistence.UriUsage
    Defined in order to count how many times an URI has been consumed.
    Persistence.UriUsages
    Used by the classes overriding the Persistence class, so as to keep track of how many time each persisted URI has been accessed.
    Values
    Gathers interfaces and classes for handling business objects in cache.
    Values.BackedCachedMap<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
    Enables to cache in memory and on persistent cache a map of business objects.
    Values.BackedCachedValue<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>  
    Values.CachedMap<BusinessObjectType,KeyType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
    Enables to cache in memory a map of business objects.
    Values.CachedValue<BusinessObjectType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
    Enables to cache a business object in memory only.
    Values.Caching
    Defines a common class for all "cacheables", i.e.
    Values.Info<BusinessObjectType>
    Gathers a business object and its time stamp.
    Values.MemoryAndCacheInstructions<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>  
    Values.MemoryInstructions<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>  
    Values.OnlyFromCacheInstructions<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>  
    Values.RetentionInstructions<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>  
    Values.SessionInstructions<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>  
    Values.WithParameterInstructions<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Cacher.Status
    Defines some common statuses.
    Values.Instructions.Result
    States the result of an assessment.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Values.CacheException
    The exception which may be triggered to indicate that a caching method has failed.
    Values.InstructionsException  
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    Persistence.PersistenceException
    The exception thrown when an error occurs during a persistence operation.

Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache Description

Contains some caching features, based on RAM or/and the SD card (persistence) of the terminal.
